user_query: Josh who I've only seen in Dumb and Dumberer and this but he does especially a good job whenever he is being tortured because not a lot of people give enough credit to horror performances a lot of times they just kind of write everybody off that's involved with movies like these as if there's not really any Talent on display and I've always felt like it must take a lot for an actor to go take for take for take trying to elicit this terrified emotion trying to elicit this you know screaming and Howling and drooling and everything without it looking ridiculous and you genuinely feel like this dude is scared for his life whenever he is in this situation and I always try to give credit to that so while he's not nearly as interesting of a character as Paxton which is not a high bar I feel like he does really good on the horror side of things but especially I wanted to point out the guy I think his name is Jan Vlasák he's a Czech Republic actor so I apologize if I messed up his name but he's the one playing the Dutch businessman who ends up being the one who tortures and kills Josh Sergeant he holds the very essence of life in his hands your life he touches and you get introduced to him whenever they're on the train and he's got this very overly friendly Vibe about him that it's a little too much to where it's off-putting and some of that is just being an American you know some of the friendly customs of other countries and and starting to dive into that whole thing of being a

entities.entity_description: Josh는 영화에서 고문당하는 장면을 연기하는 캐릭터로, 공포에 질린 감정을 진정성 있게 표현한다
Dumb and Dumberer는 Josh 역 배우가 출연한 또 다른 영화이다
Paxton은 영화의 또 다른 캐릭터로, Josh보다 더 흥미로운 캐릭터로 언급된다
Jan Vlasák는 체코 공화국 출신 배우로, 네덜란드 사업가 역할을 연기했다
Dutch Businessman은 기차에서 처음 등장하며 지나치게 친근한 태도를 보이고, 결국 Josh를 고문하고 죽이는 인물이다

relationships.relationship_description: Jan Vlasák는 네덜란드 사업가 역할을 연기했다
Josh와 Paxton은 같은 영화에 등장하는 캐릭터들이다

DUMB AND DUMBERER.description: DUMB AND DUMBERER -> DUMB AND DUMBERER
